enumParam.name: protein_coding_only
enumParam.help: Should only protein coding genes be returned?

stringParam.name: single_gene_id
stringParam.help: Gene IDs (locus tags) are quite different for each species. We use the gene IDs provided by the sequence generator.

stringParam.name: min_mutual_information_score
stringParam.help: Enter the minimum mutual information score to report similarities. The score range is from 0.472 to 1.67

stringParam.name: min_num_query_matches
stringParam.help: Enter the minimum number of queries you want to match to your genes. If you input 5 genes ids for your query and enter 5 minimum number of queries then the only genes returned would be ones that all 5 queries match

flatVocabParam.name: tfbs_name
flatVocabParam.help: The image displayed below indicates the binding site for the chosen transcription factor.

stringParam.name: tfbs_distance
stringParam.help: Enter the maximum distance you want to allow the center of the peak to be from the 5' end of the gene. Note that the larger the value entered here (3000 bp maximum) the greater the chance for aberrant results.

enumParam.name: tfbs_pvalue
enumParam.help: The p value cutoff for this search. The P value is the probability that the binding site with that score would match at that position given the input DNA (inter-genic and telomeric regions). For example, a P value of 1X10<sup>-4</sup> means that you would find a match that good every 10,000 basepairs on average on that strand.

enumParam.name: tfbs_num_sites
enumParam.help: Choose the minimum number of sites per gene that meet your other criteria.

enumParam.name: tfbs_direction
enumParam.prompt: Binding Site location relative to 5' end of gene
enumParam.help: Choose whether the peak should be upstream or downstream of the 5' end of the gene.

stringParam.name: chip_distance
stringParam.help: Enter the maximum distance you want to allow the center of the peak to be from the 5' end of the gene. Note that the larger the value entered here (3000 bp maximum) the greater the chance for aberrant results.

stringParam.name: chip_score
stringParam.help: The score for a peak is the average of the normalized log ratio values for all the probes covered in the peak (the log ratio value of the probe used in computing the average is normalized with respect to all the probes).

enumParam.name: chip_reps
enumParam.help: Choose the number of peaks for this antibody/treatment. Note that the PLK (TypeII) strain was only done with one replicate. Note that this is the total number of peaks per antibody/treatment pair.

enumParam.name: chip_direction
enumParam.prompt: Peak location relative to 5' end of gene
enumParam.help: Choose whether the peak should be upstream or downstream of the 5' end of the gene.

flatVocabParam.name: chip_strains
flatVocabParam.help: Choose a strain from which the samples were prepared.

flatVocabParam.name: chip_antibody_toxo
flatVocabParam.help: Choose an Antibody

flatVocabParam.name: chip_replicates
flatVocabParam.help: Choose 'Yes' if you would like to fetch genes that have evidence from both replicates.

flatVocabParam.name: chip_replicates_plasmo
flatVocabParam.help: Choose 'Yes' if you would like to fetch genes that have evidence from both replicates.

flatVocabParam.name: chip_experiment
flatVocabParam.help: Choose a ChIP on chip assay/experiment

flatVocabParam.name: chip_antibody_plasmo

stringParam.name: st_max_five_prime_distance
stringParam.help: Enter the maximum distance you want to allow the tag to be from the 5' end of the gene. This is assuming that the gene model does not contain the entire transcribed region which is frequently the case. Note that the larger the value entered here (1000 bp maximum) the greater the chance for aberrant results.

stringParam.name: st_max_three_prime_distance
stringParam.help: Enter the maximum distance you want to allow the tag to be from the 3' end of the gene. This is assuming that the gene model does not contain the entire transcribed region which is frequently the case. Note that the larger the value entered here (1000 bp maximum) the greater the chance for aberrant results.

stringParam.name: st_min_tag_count
stringParam.help: Enter the minimum frequency of the SAGE tags meeting your criteria. Tags must have this minimum frequency in at least one selected SAGE library.

stringParam.name: st_max_occurrences
stringParam.help: Enter the maximum number of times the sequence for this SAGE tag is present in the genome.

enumParam.name: sense_antisense
enumParam.help: Choose whether to consider SAGE tags which are sense or antisense relative to the genes returned.

enumParam.name: plasmo_new_product
enumParam.help: Choose whether to return genes with new product names.

enumParam.name: plasmo_new_ec
enumParam.help: Choose whether to return genes with EC numbers assigned at workshop

enumParam.name: plasmo_new_go
enumParam.help: Choose whether to return genes with GO terms assigned at the workshop.

enumParam.name: plasmo_new_cds
enumParam.help: Choose whether to return genes with altered coding sequence

enumParam.name: plasmo_annot_status
enumParam.prompt: Status change from old (release 5.5) to new (release 6.0) annotation
enumParam.help: Choose which genes to return based on their change in status from old to new annotation.

stringParam.name: sage_tag_min_r
stringParam.help: Choose a minimum R value to be returned. Stekel et al.’s R-statistic (Stekel, Git, and Falciani 2000) scores SAGE tags on differential expression among libraries (more variable tags have higher R values), with no assignment of significance values.

flatVocabParam.name: ec_number_pattern
flatVocabParam.help: Enzyme Commission numbers describe enzymes hierarchically by the class of rections they catalize. Use '-' as a wildcard in place of numbers to denote partial EC Numbers.

stringParam.name: num_exons_gte
stringParam.help: Which genes are annotated as containing introns? One easy way to do this search is to look for genes with more than one annotated exon. Enter a minimum of exons you would like to search for as an integer, e.g. '3'.

stringParam.name: num_exons_lte
stringParam.help: Enter a maximum number of exons you would like to search for as an integer, e.g. '3'.

stringParam.name: min_number_est_aligned
stringParam.help: Enter the minimum number of ESTs that must align from the libraries selected to return a gene.

stringParam.name: p_value
stringParam.prompt: P value less than or equal to
stringParam.help: The p value cutoff for this search. The p value for the gene indicates the significance of the difference in sequence coverage for the comparison selected. (p values were estimated using the Fisher's Exact Test). When more than one sample is chosen, the highest and the lowest p value for a gene across multiple samples is reported.

stringParam.name: confidence
stringParam.help: PaGE reports 1 - False Discovery Rate (FDR), which is called the "confidence" for the predictions. The FDR of a set of predictions is the expected percent of false predictions in the set of predictions. For example if the algorithm returns 100 genes with a false discovery rate of .3 (confidence=0.7) then we should expect 70 of them to be correct.

stringParam.name: fold_change_cov
stringParam.help: Enter a non-negative number. NOTE: Fold change is reported in the summary as positive numbers for genes with greater coverage in the comparison than reference sample and negative numbers for genes with lesser coverage in the comparison than the reference sample

stringParam.name: fold_change
stringParam.help: Enter a non-negative number. NOTE: Fold change is reported in the summary as positive numbers for up-regulated genes and negative numbers for down-regulated genes

stringParam.name: fold_difference
stringParam.help: Enter a non-negative number. NOTE: Fold difference is reported in the summary as positive numbers for up-regulated genes and negative numbers for down-regulated genes

stringParam.name: minimum_percentile_value
stringParam.help: Enter a number for the minimum percentile value that the selected samples must meet in order to be included in the fold change calculation. Note: this value is the minimum of the reference if down-regulated or the comparator if up-regulated.

stringParam.name: correlation
stringParam.help: Enter a non-negative number. NOTE: Correlation is reported in the summary as positive numbers for positively correlated genes and negative numbers for negatively correlated genes

flatVocabParam.name: regulated_dir_coverage
flatVocabParam.help: For ConditionA vs. ConditionB, select 'increase in coverage' for genes where ConditionA > ConditionB and select 'decrease in coverage' for genes where ConditionB > ConditionA.

flatVocabParam.name: regulated_dir
flatVocabParam.help:
• - Select 'up-regulated' to find genes that have higher expression in the comparator as compared to the reference.

  • - Select 'down-regulated' to find genes that have lower expression in the comparator as compared to the reference.

  • - Select 'up or down regulated' to find genes that have higher or lower expression in the comparator as compared to the reference.

enumParam.name: regulated_dir_up_down_only
enumParam.help: Select up-regulated for genes where Reference < Comparison and select down-regulated for genes where Reference > Comparison. Note that when selecting up-regulated, the minimum value of samples selected in Reference will be used and reported and the maximum value of samples in Comparison. The opposite is true if down-regulated is selected.

enumParam.name: group_operator
enumParam.help: Choose the operation to use if you select multiple samples. Choosing minimum / maximum if doing up-regulated will use the minimum of the Reference and the maximum of the Comparison to calculate fold change (opposite for down-regulated). Choosing average will use the average of the samples selected in each group to calculate the fold change.

enumParam.name: fold_change_operator
enumParam.help: Choose the operation (min/max/average) to be applied when genes have multiple fold change values (due to comparison with different samples/time points). This parameter only makes a difference if more than one sample/time point is chosen.

flatVocabParam.name: min_max_avg_comp
flatVocabParam.help: Choose the operation (min/max/average) to be applied to the chosen sample(s). This parameter only makes a difference if more than one sample/time point is chosen.

flatVocabParam.name: min_max_avg_ref
flatVocabParam.help: Choose the operation (min/max/average) to be applied to the chosen sample(s). This parameter only makes a difference if more than one sample/time point is chosen.

enumParam.name: apply_scaling
enumParam.help: Choose whether to apply the scaling factor for the amount of RNA isolated and number of nuclei described below.

enumParam.name: global_min_max
enumParam.prompt: Global min / max in selected time points
enumParam.help: Is the minimum and/or maximum expression value accross the entire experiment contained in the chosen samples?

enumParam.name: correlation_dir
enumParam.help: There are two types or directions of correlation (two patterns that correlations can follow).

enumParam.help: The percentile was calculated on the mean of each sample group over all the spots on the array.

stringParam.name: percentile
stringParam.help: Expression percentile reflects the expression level of one gene compared to other genes from the same array for one time point. Genes are returned if ANY time point in the series has a percentile above the chosen value.

stringParam.name: min_tm
stringParam.help: Proteins may have none, one or more transmembrane domains. Please enter a minimum number of predicted transmembrane domains to start your search.

stringParam.name: max_tm
stringParam.help: Proteins may have none, one or more transmembrane domains. Please enter a maximum number of predicted transmembrane domains to start your search.

stringParam.name: min_sigp_sum_score
stringParam.help: SignalP-NN (neural network) provides four scores and a conclusion for each such that the conclusion is 1 if the score meets a certain criteria and 0 otherwise. The SignalP summary conclusion is the sum of the four conclusions generated by SignalP, thus four is the highest score possible. We consider a summary conclusion score of three to be significant

stringParam.name: min_sigp_d_score
stringParam.help: The D-score is the average of the S-mean and Y-max score from SignalP-NN

stringParam.name: min_sigp_signal_probability

flatVocabParam.name: geneType
flatVocabParam.help: Select a gene type.

'Repeat genes' refers to the most common 59 repeat families identified in the assembly. They constitute ~39 Mb of the genome and can be classified as (1) virus-like, (2) transposon-like, (3) retrotransposon-like, and (4) unclassified (no similarity to known proteins, peptide motifs, or nucleotide sequences). Most are present in hundreds of copies (average ~660) and each family is extraordinarily homogenous, with a ~2.5% average polymorphism.

Select a gene type:

TypeValid for:
snRNA encodingAmoeba. Giardia, Microsporidia, Plasmo, TriTryp
tRNA encodingall
ncRNAAmoeba. Microsporidia, TriTryp
rRNA encodingall
snoRNA encodingCrypto, Giardia, TriTryp
misc RNACrypto, Plasmo
SRP RNA encodingGiardia
RNase P RNAGiardia
RNase MRP RNAGiardia
repeat regionTrich
scRNA encodingTriTryp

enumParam.name: BlastDatabaseType
enumParam.help: The type of the target database (eg CDS, Transcripts, Proteins)

enumParam.name: epitope_confidence
enumParam.help: Epitopes are mapped to genes in @PROJECT_ID@ using high quality BLAST similarities (percent identity >= 97%) between the GenBank proteins listed on IEDB and the proteins found in @PROJECT_ID@, and exact string matching. Confidence levels are assigned to each set of epitopes based on the quality of this mapping. A high confidence is assigned to a set where all of the epitopes are found on a given BLAST hit. A medium confidence is assigned to a set where either some, but not all, of the epitopes in a set are found on a given BLAST hit, or where all of the epitopes in a set are found in a given protein, but the protein was not identified as a match by BLAST. A low confidence is assigned to sets where some, but not all, of the epitopes are found in a given protein, but the protein was not identified by BLAST. Choose one or more assigned confidence levels to search for epitopes in.

enumValue.internal: 'Full Set Not on Blast Hit','Not Full Set On Blast Hit'
'Not Full Set Not on Blast Hit'

enumParam.name: liberal_conservative
enumParam.help: Select if Liberal or Conservative co-ordinates for haplotype blocks are to be used. A Conservative estimate of a haplotype block starts at the first microsatellite to map within the region and ends at the last microsatellite to map in the region. A Liberal estimate of a haplotype block starts at the end of the last microsatellite that was mapped in the previous haplotype block region and ends at the beginning of the first microsatellite mapped in the next haplotype block region. Both estimates are provided because of the lack of accurate co-ordinates of where exactly the cross-over event happened.

enumParam.name: subType
enumParam.help: Genes with little or no evidence that overlapped (or were subsumed by) larger genes for which there was evidence such as protein similarities, expression evidence from EST alignments, SAGE or proteomics data were marked as deprecated. These genes will likely be removed in a subsequent release of GiardiaDB (and in GenBank) unless additional evidence is provided indicating they should be moved into the real gene category. Please add a user comment to those deprecated genes for which you have experimental evidence indicating that they are real.

flatVocabParam.name: nonnuclear_sequence
flatVocabParam.help: Nonnuclear genomic sequence of various Plasmodium organisms includes the sequence of the mitochondrial and apicoplast genomes.
Nonnuclear genomic sequence for T. gondii includes the sequence of the apicoplast genome.

Nonnuclear genomic sequence of various Plasmodium organisms includes the sequence of the mitochondrial and apicoplast genomes. Nonnuclear genomic sequence for T. gondii includes the sequence of the apicoplast genome.

sqlQuery.name: NonNuclearSequence
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.source_id as internal, sa.source_id as term, so.term_name as display FROM apidbtuning.sequenceattributes sa, SRes.sequenceontology so WHERE sa.so_id = so.so_id AND so.term_name in ('mitochondrial_chromosome', 'apicoplast_chromosome') AND sa.organism = $$org_with_nonnuclear_genes$$ ORDER BY so.term_name

sqlQuery.name: ProfileTimeShift
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT num AS internal, num ||' hours' AS term, num ||' hours' AS display FROM (SELECT Rownum num FROM dual CONNECT BY Rownum <= 24 UNION SELECT 0 num FROM dual UNION SELECT Rownum * (-1) num FROM dual CONNECT BY Rownum <= 24 ) t ORDER BY t.num asc

SELECT num AS internal, num ||' hours' AS term, num ||' hours' AS display FROM (SELECT Rownum num FROM dual CONNECT BY Rownum <= 6 UNION SELECT 0 num FROM dual UNION SELECT Rownum * (-1) num FROM dual CONNECT BY Rownum <= 6 ) t ORDER BY t.num asc

SELECT num AS internal, num ||' hours' AS term, num ||' hours' AS display FROM (SELECT Rownum num FROM dual CONNECT BY Rownum <= 36 UNION SELECT 0 num FROM dual UNION SELECT Rownum * (-1) num FROM dual CONNECT BY Rownum <= 36 ) t WHERE mod(num,12) = 0 ORDER BY t.num asc

sqlQuery.name: ProfileTimeShiftFerdig
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT num AS internal, num ||' hours' AS term, num ||' hours' AS display FROM (SELECT Rownum num FROM dual CONNECT BY Rownum <= 18 UNION SELECT 0 num FROM dual UNION SELECT Rownum * (-1) num FROM dual CONNECT BY Rownum <= 18 ) t ORDER BY t.num asc

sqlQuery.name: ProfileProfileSet
sqlQuery.sql: select 'M.White Cell Cycle Microarray spline smoothed - Interpolated' as term, 'M.White Cell Cycle Microarray spline smoothed - Interpolated' as internal, 'M.White Cell Cycle Microarray spline smoothed - Interpolated' as display from dual
select 'Cparvum_RT_PCR_Kissinger' as term, 'Cparvum_RT_PCR_Kissinger' as internal, 'C. parvum post-infection semi quantitative Real Time PCR' as display from dual
select name as term, name as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'DeRisi % Smoothed'

sqlQuery.name: Pviv_Timing
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, replace(name, 'ZB Pvivax time series', 'Patient') as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'ZB Pvivax time series %'

sqlQuery.name: Pviv_Timing_Percentile
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, replace(name, 'red percentile - ZB Pvivax time series', 'Patient') as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'red percentile - ZB Pvivax time series %'

sqlQuery.name: Pber_Waters_DOZI_Direct_Comp
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'DOZI Knockout v. Wild Type' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'P. berghei DOZI array data'

sqlQuery.name: Pber_Waters_DOZI_Percentile
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, case when lower(name) like 'red%' then 'DOZI Knock-Out' when lower(name) like 'green%' then 'Wild Type' end as display from apidb.profileset where name like '%percentile - P. berghei DOZI array data'

sqlQuery.name: Pber_Waters_DOZI_Percentile_Sample
sqlQuery.sql: Select pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, case when lower(ps.name) like 'red%' then 'DOZI Knock-Out' when lower(ps.name) like 'green%' then 'Wild Type' end as display from apidb.profileset ps, apidb.profileElementName pen where ps.name like '%percentile - P. berghei DOZI array data' and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id and pen.profile_set_id = '$$profileset_generic$$' order by element_order

sqlQuery.name: Pyoe_Kappe_Percentile
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'Kappe - P. yoelli Liver Stages' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'percentile - kappe_profiles_averaged_over_all_channels'

sqlQuery.name: ProfileProfileSetFerdig
sqlQuery.sql: select 'Profiles of DD2-HB3 expression from Ferdig' as term, 'Profiles of DD2-HB3 expression from Ferdig' as internal, 'Profiles of DD2-HB3 expression from Ferdig' as display from dual

sqlQuery.name: regulatedDirection
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT 'up or down regulated' as term, 'abs' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'down-regulated' as term, '-' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'up-regulated' as term, '+' as internal from dual

sqlQuery.name: regulatedDirRNAi
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT 'Decrease in coverage' as display, 'down-regulated' as term, '-' as internal from dual

sqlQuery.name: PhyleticIndentMap
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT (level-1) as internal, three_letter_abbrev as term FROM apidb.orthomclTaxon WHERE parent_id IS NOT NULL AND lower(three_letter_abbrev) != 'tgrh' START WITH orthomcl_taxon_id = (select min(orthomcl_taxon_id) from apidb.orthomclTaxon) CONNECT BY parent_id = prior orthomcl_taxon_id ORDER BY depth_first_index ASC, level ASC, three_letter_abbrev ASC

sqlQuery.name: TfbsNames
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct bf.name as term, bf.name as internal from ApidbTuning.TFBSGene bg, dots.bindingsitefeature bf, sres.externaldatabase d, sres.externaldatabaserelease rel where d.name = 'pfal3D7_genomeFeature_Llinas_TransFactorBindingSites_GFF2_RSRC' and d.external_database_id = rel.external_database_id and rel.external_database_release_id = bf.external_database_release_id and bg.tfbs_na_feature_id = bf.na_feature_id order by bf.name

sqlQuery.name: PhyleticTermMap
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT three_letter_abbrev as term, name as internal FROM apidb.orthomcltaxon WHERE lower(three_letter_abbrev) != 'tgrh' ORDER BY depth_first_index ASC, three_letter_abbrev ASC

sqlQuery.name: ChIPAntibodyToxo
sqlQuery.sql: select replace(display,' - none','') as display, internal as internal, term as term from (select distinct cpp.antibody||'|'||cpp.treatment as term, cpp.antibody||'|'||cpp.treatment as internal, CASE WHEN cpp.antibody in (select cpp.antibody from ApidbTuning.ChIPProtocolParams cpp where cpp.replicate = 2) THEN CASE WHEN cpp.antibody like 'H3K%' THEN '(1) '||cpp.antibody||' - '||cpp.treatment ELSE '(3) '||cpp.antibody END ELSE '(2) ' ||cpp.antibody||' - '||cpp.treatment||' - No Replicates ' END as display from ApidbTuning.ChIPProtocolParams cpp where cpp.strain = $$chip_strains$$ and cpp.antibody != 'H3K4me1' and cpp.protocol_type = 'called_peaks') order by display

sqlQuery.name: ChIPReplicates
sqlQuery.sql: select term,internal,display from (select 'Yes' as term, 1 as internal,'Yes' as display from (select count(distinct replicate) as replicates from ApidbTuning.ChIPProtocolParams where strain = $$chip_strains$$ and protocol_type = 'called_peaks') cpp where cpp.replicates > 1 union select 'No' as term, 0 as internal, 'No' as display from (select count(distinct replicate) as replicates from ApidbTuning.ChIPProtocolParams where strain = $$chip_strains$$ and protocol_type = 'called_peaks') cpp where cpp.replicates > 1 union select 'No' as term, 0 as internal, 'Not Applicable' as display from (select count(distinct replicate) as replicates from ApidbTuning.ChIPProtocolParams where strain = $$chip_strains$$ and protocol_type = 'called_peaks') cpp where cpp.replicates in (1,0)) order by display asc

sqlQuery.name: PlasmoChIPReplicates
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct decode(replicate, null, 'Not Applicable', 'Yes') as display, decode(replicate, null, 0, 1) as term, decode(replicate, null, 0, 1) as internal from APIDBTUNING.chipprotocolparams where protocol_type = 'called_peaks' and experiment_name = '$$chip_experiment$$' union select 'No' as display, 0 as term, 0 as internal from APIDBTUNING.chipprotocolparams where protocol_type = 'called_peaks' and replicate is not null and experiment_name = '$$chip_experiment$$'

sqlQuery.name: ChIPAntibodyPlasmo
sqlQuery.sql: select case when display like '%H3K4%' THEN display || ' (only wild type)' WHEN display like '%H4K20%' THEN display || ' (only wild type)' ELSE display END as display, term, internal from (select distinct NVL(antibody, 'Not Applicable') as display, NVL(antibody, 'Not Applicable') as term, NVL(antibody, 'Not Applicable') as internal from APIDBTUNING.chipprotocolparams where experiment_name = '$$chip_experiment$$' and protocol_type = 'called_peaks' )

sqlQuery.name: ChIPGenotype
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct replace(NVL(genotype, 'Not Applicable'), '_', ' ') as display, NVL(genotype, 'Not Applicable') as term, NVL(genotype, 'Not Applicable') as internal from APIDBTUNING.chipprotocolparams where experiment_name = '$$chip_experiment$$' and protocol_type = 'called_peaks'

sqlQuery.name: ChIp_Assays
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct cpp.strain as term, cpp.strain as internal, CASE WHEN cpp.strain = 'CTG' THEN 'CTG (TypeIII)' WHEN cpp.strain = 'RH' THEN 'RH (TypeI)' WHEN cpp.strain = 'PLK' THEN 'PLK (TypeII)' END as display from ApidbTuning.ChIPProtocolParams cpp where cpp.protocol_type = 'called_peaks' and cpp.strain is not null and cpp.strain != 'unknown'

sqlQuery.name: ChIp_Experiments
sqlQuery.sql: select term,internal,display from (select 'Histone modifications in wild type and Sir2 knock-outs' as term, 'pfal3D7_Artur_Scherf' as internal,'(1) Histone modifications in wild type and Sir2 knock-outs' as display from dual union select 'Genome-wide assoc. of (Hp-1) with virulence gene clusters' as term, 'pfal3D7_Till_Voss' as internal, '(2) Genome-wide assoc. of Hp-1 with virulence gene clusters' as display from dual) order by display asc

sqlQuery.name: PFTimeSeriesPctProfileSet
sqlQuery.sql: select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, replace((replace (p.name,'red percentile - DeRisi','iRBC')),'Smoothed','(48 Hour scaled)') as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name in ('red percentile - DeRisi 3D7 Smoothed','red percentile - DeRisi Dd2 Smoothed','red percentile - DeRisi HB3 Smoothed') order by name desc

sqlQuery.name: PFTimeSeriesFoldChangeProfileSet
sqlQuery.sql: select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, replace((replace (p.name,'DeRisi','iRBC')),'Smoothed','(48 Hour scaled)') as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name in ('DeRisi 3D7 Smoothed','DeRisi Dd2 Smoothed','DeRisi HB3 Smoothed') order by name desc

sqlQuery.name: PFTimeSeriesSamples
sqlQuery.sql: select display, term,internal,parentTerm,sortTerm from ( select to_number(tpp.profile_as_string) || ' Hour' as display, to_number(tpp.profile_as_string) || ' Hour' as term, apidb.tab_to_string(set(cast(COLLECT(to_char(pen.profile_element_name_id)) as apidb.varchartab)), ',') as internal, CASE WHEN to_number(tpp.profile_as_string) > 0 AND to_number(tpp.profile_as_string) <= 8 THEN 'Early Ring' WHEN to_number(tpp.profile_as_string) > 8 AND to_number(tpp.profile_as_string) <= 16 THEN 'Late Ring' WHEN to_number(tpp.profile_as_string) > 16 AND to_number(tpp.profile_as_string) <= 23 THEN 'Early Trophozoite' WHEN to_number(tpp.profile_as_string) > 23 AND to_number(tpp.profile_as_string) <= 30 THEN 'Late Trophozoite' WHEN to_number(tpp.profile_as_string) > 30 AND to_number(tpp.profile_as_string) <= 39 THEN 'Early Schizont' ELSE 'Late Schizont' END as parentTerm, to_number(tpp.profile_as_string) as sortTerm from apidb.profileset ps, apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profile tpp, apidb.profileset tpps where pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id and ps.profile_set_id = $$profileset_generic$$ and tpps.name = decode(ps.name, 'DeRisi 3D7 Smoothed', '48 Hour Cycle Timepoint Map for 3D7', 'red percentile - DeRisi 3D7 Smoothed', '48 Hour Cycle Timepoint Map for 3D7', 'DeRisi HB3 Smoothed', '48 Hour Cycle Timepoint Map for HB3', 'red percentile - DeRisi HB3 Smoothed', '48 Hour Cycle Timepoint Map for HB3', 'DeRisi Dd2 Smoothed', '48 Hour Cycle Timepoint Map for Dd2', 'red percentile - DeRisi Dd2 Smoothed', '48 Hour Cycle Timepoint Map for Dd2') and tpps.profile_set_id = tpp.profile_set_id and tpp.source_id = pen.name group by to_number(tpp.profile_as_string) UNION select '1-16 Hours' as display, 'Ring' as term, '-1' as internal, '' as parentTerm, -3 as sortTerm from dual UNION select '1-8 Hours' as display, 'Early Ring' as term, '-1' as internal, 'Ring' as parentTerm, -2 as sortTerm from dual UNION select '9-16 Hours' as display, 'Late Ring' as term, '-1' as internal, 'Ring' as parentTerm, -1 as sortTerm from dual UNION select '17-30 Hours' as display, 'Trophozoite' as term, '-1' as internal, '' as parentTerm, -2 as sortTerm from dual UNION select '17-23 Hours' as display, 'Early Trophozoite' as term, '-1' as internal, 'Trophozoite' as parentTerm, -2 as sortTerm from dual UNION select '24-30 Hours' as display, 'Late Trophozoite' as term, '-1' as internal, 'Trophozoite' as parentTerm, -1 as sortTerm from dual UNION select '31-48 Hours' as display, 'Schizont' as term, '-1' as internal, '' as parentTerm, -1 as sortTerm from dual UNION select '31-39 Hours' as display, 'Early Schizont' as term, '-1' as internal, 'Schizont' as parentTerm, -2 as sortTerm from dual UNION select '40-48 Hours' as display, 'Late Schizont' as term, '-1' as internal, 'Schizont' as parentTerm, -1 as sortTerm from dual ) order by to_number(sortTerm)

sqlQuery.name: MetbPathwaysList
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct n.description ||' ('|| n.name||')' as display, n.network_id as term, n.network_id as internal from apidb.network n

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeProfileSetFl
sqlQuery.sql: select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Replicate 1' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'Linfantum promastigote time-course biorep01' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Replicate 2' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'Linfantum promastigote time-course biorep02'

sqlQuery.name: ToxoTSFCProfileSetFl
sqlQuery.sql: select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'VEG CO2-starvation bradyzoite-inducing conditions (extended)' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'expression profiles of VEG strain CO2-starvation bradyzoite inducing conditions : 2-6 days (by Florence Dzierszinski)' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Pru CO2-starvation bradyzoite-inducing conditions (extended)' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain CO2-starvation bradyzoite inducing conditions : 2-14 days (by Florence Dzierszinski)'

sqlQuery.name: ToxoTSFCProfileSetFlPct
sqlQuery.sql: select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'VEG CO2-starvation bradyzoite-inducing conditions (extended)' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'percentile - expression profiles of VEG strain CO2-starvation bradyzoite inducing conditions : 2-6 days (by Florence Dzierszinski)' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Pru CO2-starvation bradyzoite-inducing conditions (extended)' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'percentile - expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain CO2-starvation bradyzoite inducing conditions : 2-14 days (by Florence Dzierszinski)'

sqlQuery.name: LdTimeSeriesFoldChangeProfileSet
sqlQuery.sql: select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Replicate 1' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'Linfantum promastigote time-course biorep01' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Replicate 2' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'Linfantum promastigote time-course biorep02'

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeProfileSetPDPct
sqlQuery.sql: select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'RH Alkaline Bradyzoite-inducing conditions' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'percentile - expression profiles of RH delta-HXGPRT delta-UPRT strain Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Pru Sodium Nitroprusside bradyzoite-inducing conditions' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'percentile - expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain sodium nitroprusside bradyzoite-inducing conditions' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Pru CO2-starvation bradyzoite-inducing conditions' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'percentile - expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain CO2-starvation bradyzoite-inducing conditions' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Pru Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'percentile - expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions (media pH 8.2)'

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeProfileSetPD
sqlQuery.sql: select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'RH Alkaline Bradyzoite-inducing conditions' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'expression profiles of RH delta-HXGPRT delta-UPRT strain Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Pru Sodium Nitroprusside bradyzoite-inducing conditions' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain sodium nitroprusside bradyzoite-inducing conditions' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Pru CO2-starvation bradyzoite-inducing conditions' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain CO2-starvation bradyzoite-inducing conditions' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Pru Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions (media pH 8.2)'

sqlQuery.name: TbTimeSeriesFoldChangeProfileSet
sqlQuery.sql: select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, '(1) T. brucei Microarray Time Series' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'Expression profiling of T. brucei microarray data from Christine Clayton' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, '(2) T.brucei Differentiation Time Series' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'Expression profiling of T. brucei differentiation series'

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeOnePd
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where (($$ts_fc_profile_one_pd$$ = 0 and ps.name = 'expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions (media pH 8.2)') or $$ts_fc_profile_one_pd$$ != 0 and ps.profile_set_id = $$ts_fc_profile_one_pd$$) and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: CellCycleFoldChangeMW
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'M.White Cell Cycle Microarray spline smoothed' and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeTwoPd
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where (($$ts_fc_profile_two_pd$$ = 0 and ps.name = 'expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions (media pH 8.2)') or $$ts_fc_profile_two_pd$$ != 0 and ps.profile_set_id = $$ts_fc_profile_two_pd$$) and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeTb
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, CASE WHEN pen.name like '%sl%' then 'Slender' WHEN pen.name like '%bf-ld%' then 'Blood form - low density' WHEN pen.name like '%bf-hd%' then 'Blood form - high density' ELSE pen.name END as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = $$tb_fc_profile_pd$$ and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeOneFl
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where (($$ts_fc_profile_one_fl$$ = 0 and ps.name = 'expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions (media pH 8.2)') or $$ts_fc_profile_one_fl$$ != 0 and ps.profile_set_id = $$ts_fc_profile_one_fl$$) and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: LdTimeSeriesFoldChangeTwoFl
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = $$ld_fc_profile_two_fl$$ and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeTwoFl
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where (($$ts_fc_profile_two_fl$$ = 0 and ps.name = 'expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions (media pH 8.2)') or $$ts_fc_profile_two_fl$$ != 0 and ps.profile_set_id = $$ts_fc_profile_two_fl$$) and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeMatt
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'expression profiles of T. gondii Matt_Tz-Bz time series'

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeMattPct
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'percentile - expression profiles of T. gondii Matt_Tz-Bz time series'

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesBrady48Hr
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'three Tgondii strains under both normal-tachyzoite and induced-bradyzoite conditions'

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesBrady48HrPct
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'percentile - three Tgondii strains under both normal-tachyzoite and induced-bradyzoite conditions'

sqlQuery.name: EhistTimeSeriesFCProfileSet
sqlQuery.sql: select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, CASE WHEN p.name like '%Affy%' THEN 'Strains labeled with Affymetrix amplification protocol <sup>1</sup>' WHEN p.name like '%Nugen%' THEN 'Strains labeled with Nugen SPIA amplification protocol <sup>1,2</sup>' END as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name in ('EhistolyticaAffyProfiles','EhistolyticaNugenProfiles')

sqlQuery.name: EHTimeSeriesFoldChangeTP
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, CASE WHEN (pen.name like '%MS75-3544%' OR pen.name like '%HM-1:IMSS - Trophs TYI%' OR pen.name like '%Rahman - Trophs TYI%' OR pen.name like '%200:NIH%' OR pen.name like '%Rahman Trophs TYI%' OR pen.name like '%2592100%') THEN '' || pen.name || '<sup>1</sup>' ELSE '' || pen.name || '<sup>2</sup>' END as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = $$profileSetEHisto$$ and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: EcNumberList
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ec.ec_number AS internal, ec.ec_number AS term, ec.ec_number || ' (' || ec.description || ')' AS display FROM sres.enzymeClass ec, ApidbTuning.TypeAheadCounts tac WHERE ec.ec_number = tac.option_id AND tac.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@'

sqlQuery.name: GoTermList
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT gt.go_id AS internal, gt.go_id AS term, gt.go_id || ' : ' || gt.name AS display, gt.minimum_level, length(gt.name) FROM sres.GoTerm gt, sres.gorelationship gr, dots.goassociation ga, ApidbTuning.TypeAheadCounts tac WHERE gt.go_term_id = gr.parent_term_id AND ga.go_term_id = gr.child_term_id AND tac.option_id = gt.go_id AND tac.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' ORDER BY gt.minimum_level, length(gt.name)

sqlQuery.name: MassAssay
sqlQuery.sql: WITH OrganismConstraint as ( select distinct ims.sample, ims.organism, ims.experiment, ims.project_id, ims.internal_id, ims.sort_order from DOTS.massspecfeature msf, apidb.massspecsummary mss, dots.translatedaafeature taaf, sres.externaldatabase ed, sres.externaldatabaserelease edr, apidbTuning.massspecterms ims where msf.parent_id = taaf.aa_feature_id and mss.mass_spec_summary_id = msf.source_id and msf.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id and edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id and ((mss.sample_file is null and ims.internal_id = ed.name) or (ims.internal_id = ed.name||'|'||mss.sample_file)) and ims.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@') select replace(replace(term,','),('''')) as term, replace(replace(parentTerm,','),('''')) as parentTerm, term as display, internal, sort_order, chars, nums from( select CASE WHEN mst.sample = mst.experiment THEN mst.experiment ELSE mst.sample END as term, CASE WHEN mst.sample = mst.experiment THEN mst.organism ELSE mst.experiment END as parentTerm, mst.internal_id as internal, mst.sort_order as sort_order, REGEXP_REPLACE(mst.sample,'[0-9]','') as chars, to_number(REGEXP_REPLACE(mst.sample,'[^0-9]','')) as nums from OrganismConstraint mst where mst.experiment is not null union select mst.experiment as term, mst.organism as parentTerm, '-1' as internal, mst.sort_order as sort_order, '' as chars, NULL as nums from OrganismConstraint mst where mst.experiment is not null and mst.experiment <> mst.sample union select mst.organism as term, ot.parentTerm as parentTerm, '-1' as internal, mst.sort_order as sort_order, '' as chars, NULL as nums from OrganismConstraint mst, Apidbtuning.organismTree ot where experiment is not null and ot.term = replace(replace(mst.organism,'',''),'','') union select ot.parentTerm as term, pt.parentTerm as parentTerm, '-1' as internal, mst.sort_order as sort_order, '' as chars, NULL as nums from OrganismConstraint mst, Apidbtuning.organismTree ot, APIDBTUNING.organismtree pt where experiment is not null and ot.term = replace(replace(mst.organism,'',''),'','') and ot.parentTerm = pt.term union select pt.parentTerm as term, '' as parentTerm, '-1' as internal, mst.sort_order as sort_order, '' as chars, NULL as nums from OrganismConstraint mst, Apidbtuning.organismTree ot, APIDBTUNING.organismtree pt where experiment is not null and ot.term = replace(replace(mst.organism,'',''),'','') and ot.parentTerm = pt.term ) order by sort_order, parentTerm, chars, nums, term

WITH OrganismConstraint as ( select distinct ims.sample, ims.organism, ims.experiment, ims.project_id, ims.internal_id, ims.sort_order from DOTS.massspecfeature msf, apidb.massspecsummary mss, dots.translatedaafeature taaf, sres.externaldatabase ed, sres.externaldatabaserelease edr, apidbTuning.massspecterms ims where msf.parent_id = taaf.aa_feature_id and mss.mass_spec_summary_id = msf.source_id and msf.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id and edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id and ((mss.sample_file is null and ims.internal_id = ed.name) or (ims.internal_id = ed.name||'|'||mss.sample_file)) and ims.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@') select replace(replace(term,','),('''')) as term, replace(replace(parentTerm,','),('''')) as parentTerm, term as display, internal, sort_order from( select CASE WHEN mst.sample = mst.experiment THEN mst.experiment ELSE mst.sample END as term, CASE WHEN mst.sample = mst.experiment THEN mst.organism ELSE mst.experiment END as parentTerm, mst.internal_id as internal, mst.sort_order as sort_order from OrganismConstraint mst where mst.experiment is not null union select mst.experiment as term, mst.organism as parentTerm, '-1' as internal, mst.sort_order as sort_order from OrganismConstraint mst where mst.experiment is not null and mst.experiment <> mst.sample union select mst.organism as term, ot.parentTerm as parentTerm, '-1' as internal, mst.sort_order as sort_order from OrganismConstraint mst, Apidbtuning.organismTree ot where experiment is not null and ot.term = replace(replace(mst.organism,'',''),'','') union select 'Leishmania donovani' as term, 'Leishmania' as parentTerm, '-1' as internal, null as sort_order from dual union select ot.parentTerm as term, pt.parentTerm as parentTerm, '-1' as internal, mst.sort_order as sort_order from OrganismConstraint mst, Apidbtuning.organismTree ot, APIDBTUNING.organismtree pt where experiment is not null and ot.term = replace(replace(mst.organism,'',''),'','') and ot.parentTerm = pt.term union select pt.parentTerm as term, '' as parentTerm, '-1' as internal, mst.sort_order as sort_order from OrganismConstraint mst, Apidbtuning.organismTree ot, APIDBTUNING.organismtree pt where experiment is not null and ot.term = replace(replace(mst.organism,'',''),'','') and ot.parentTerm = pt.term ) order by sort_order, parentTerm, term

sqlQuery.name: DomainAccession
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT dr.primary_identifier AS internal, dr.primary_identifier || ' : ' || dr.secondary_identifier AS term, dr.primary_identifier || ' : ' || dr.secondary_identifier || ' ' || dr.remark AS display, dr.secondary_identifier,dr.remark FROM sres.DbRef dr, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed, ApidbTuning.TypeAheadCounts tac WHERE dr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND edr.external_database_release_id IN ($$domain_database$$) AND tac.option_id = dr.primary_identifier AND tac.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' ORDER BY lower(dr.secondary_identifier),lower(dr.remark)

sqlQuery.name: GiardiaAnalyses
sqlQuery.sql: select a.analysis_id internal, replace(a.name, 'PaGE Analysis - ', '') as term from rad.ANALYSIS a, rad.PROTOCOL p where p.protocol_id = a.protocol_id and p.name = 'PaGE'

sqlQuery.name: GeneTypes
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct REPLACE(REPLACE(regexp_replace(ga.gene_type, 'non[ |_]protein[_| ]coding', 'misc RNA'), '_encoding', ''), '_', ' ') AS term, ga.gene_type as internal from ApidbTuning.GeneAttributes ga

sqlQuery.name: ExtraerythrocyticStages
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct name AS term, name AS internal FROM apidb.profileElementName WHERE name IN ('Sporozoite', 'Gametocyte') ORDER BY internal

sqlQuery.name: ExtraerythrocyticStageRefe
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct name AS term, name AS internal FROM apidb.profileElementName WHERE name = 'Gametocyte' ORDER BY internal

sqlQuery.name: ExtraerythrocyticStageComp
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct name AS term, name AS internal FROM apidb.profileElementName WHERE name = 'Sporozoite' ORDER BY internal

sqlQuery.name: IntraerythrocyticStages
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct name AS term, element_order AS internal FROM apidb.profileElementName WHERE name IN ('Early Ring', 'Late Ring', 'Early Schizogony', 'Late Schizogony', 'Early Trophozoite', 'Late Trophozoite', 'Merozoite') ORDER BY internal

sqlQuery.name: PlSynchronizationFldChnge
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT p.profile_set_id as internal, CASE WHEN p.name like '%_sorbExp' THEN 'Sorbitol' WHEN p.name like '%_tempExp' THEN 'Temperature' END as term FROM apidb.profileset p WHERE p.name in ('winzeler_cc_sorbExp','winzeler_cc_tempExp')

sqlQuery.name: PlSynchronizationPercentile
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT p.profile_set_id as internal, CASE WHEN p.name like '%_sorbExp' THEN 'Sorbitol' WHEN p.name like '%_tempExp' THEN 'Temperature' END as term FROM apidb.profileset p WHERE p.name in ('percentile - winzeler_cc_sorbExp','percentile - winzeler_cc_tempExp')

sqlQuery.name: WinzelerSexualFldChnge
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT p.profile_set_id as internal, p.name as term, 'Sexual Cycle Expression' as display FROM apidb.profileset p WHERE p.name = 'winzeler_cc_sexExp'

sqlQuery.name: WinzelerSexualPercentile
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT p.profile_set_id as internal, p.name as term, 'Sexual Cycle Expression' as display FROM apidb.profileset p WHERE p.name = 'percentile - winzeler_cc_sexExp'

sqlQuery.name: Reagents
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT term, internal FROM (SELECT reagent_type AS term, reagent_type AS internal, rownum AS ord FROM (SELECT DISTINCT lower(dr.secondary_identifier) AS reagent_type FROM sres.DbRef dr, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed WHERE dr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND ed.name in ('MR4DBxRefs','pfal3D7_dbxref_simple_gene2MR4Reagents_RSRC','AntibodyDBxRefs') ORDER BY lower(dr.secondary_identifier)) UNION SELECT 'any' AS term, 'any' AS internal, 0 AS ord FROM dual) ORDER BY ord

sqlQuery.name: gametocyteFldChngeStrain
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT p.profile_set_id as internal, CASE WHEN p.name like '%_3D7_MAC' THEN '3D7 MAC' WHEN p.name like '%_3D7_gametocyte' THEN '3D7 Gametocyte' WHEN p.name like '%_NF54_gametocyte' THEN 'NF54 Gametocyte' END as term FROM apidb.profileset p WHERE p.name in (' winzeler_3D7_MAC', ' winzeler_3D7_gametocyte',' winzeler_NF54_gametocyte')

sqlQuery.name: Clades
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT tn.name AS term, taxon_id AS internal FROM sres.taxonname tn WHERE tn.name IN ('Archaea', 'Eukaryota', 'Apicomplexa', 'Chordata', 'Bacteria')

sqlQuery.name: Clades
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT tn.name AS term, taxon_id AS internal FROM sres.taxonname tn WHERE tn.name IN ('Archaea', 'Eukaryota', 'Bacteria', 'Kinetoplastida') ORDER by tn.name desc

sqlQuery.name: DomainDatabase
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ed.name AS term, edr.external_database_release_id AS internal FROM sres.DbRef dr, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed WHERE dr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND dr.db_ref_id IN (SELECT draf.db_ref_id FROM dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature draf, core.AlgorithmInvocation ainv, core.AlgorithmImplementation aimp WHERE df.aa_feature_id = draf.aa_feature_id AND df.row_alg_invocation_id = ainv.algorithm_invocation_id AND ainv.algorithm_implementation_id = aimp.algorithm_implementation_id AND aimp.executable = 'ApiCommonData::Load::Plugin::InsertInterproscanResults') ORDER BY term

sqlQuery.name: gametocytePercentStrain
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.profile_set_id AS internal, DECODE(ps.name, 'percentile - winzeler_NF54_gametocyte', 'Strain NF54', 'percentile - winzeler_3D7_gametocyte', 'Strain 3D7', 'percentile - winzeler_3D7_MAC', 'Strain 3D7 (MACS-purified)', ps.name) AS term FROM apidb.profileSet ps WHERE ps.name IN ('percentile - winzeler_3D7_MAC', 'percentile - winzeler_3D7_gametocyte','percentile - winzeler_NF54_gametocyte')

sqlQuery.name: winzAsexualSample
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.name as term FROM apidb.profileelementname pen WHERE pen.profile_set_id = '$$profileset_generic$$' AND NOT pen.name = 'Gametocyte' ORDER BY pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: GlExprStudiesStress
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal,p.name as display FROM apidb.profileset p WHERE p.name = 'Stress Response profiles by temperature or varying DTT concentrations' UNION SELECT p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal,p.name as display FROM apidb.profileset p WHERE p.name = 'Stress Response profiles by varying DTT incubation time'

sqlQuery.name: GlExprStudiesStressPct
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT term, internal, REPLACE(term, 'red percentile - ','') as display FROM( SELECT p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal FROM apidb.profileset p WHERE p.name = 'red percentile - Stress Response profiles by temperature or varying DTT concentrations' UNION SELECT p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal FROM apidb.profileset p WHERE p.name = 'red percentile - Stress Response profiles by varying DTT incubation time' )

sqlQuery.name: GlExpressionSamplesStress

sqlQuery.name: GlExprStudiesEncystPct

sqlQuery.name: GlExpressionSamplesEncyst

sqlQuery.name: ringqvistSample

sqlQuery.name: ringqvistStudy
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.name as term, ps.profile_set_id as internal, ps.name as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name = 'Host Parasite Interaction'

sqlQuery.name: ringqvistStudyPct
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT term, internal, REPLACE(term, 'red percentile - ','') as display FROM( SELECT ps.name as term, ps.profile_set_id as internal, ps.name as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name = 'red percentile - Host Parasite Interaction' )

sqlQuery.name: SvardThreeStrainsRnaSeqProfiles

sqlQuery.name: SvardThreeStrainsRnaSeqPctProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_set_id as internal, name as term, name as display from apidb.profileset ps where ps.name in ('percentile - Strand-specific RNA-Seq from trophozoites of isolate WB and P15 and GS - antisense strand', 'percentile - Strand-specific RNA-Seq from trophozoites of isolate WB and P15 and GS - sense strand') order by name desc

sqlQuery.name: TroemelCeInfectionRnaSeqProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_set_id as internal, name as term, 'C. elegans Infection Time Series' as display from apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'C. elegans Time Series - Infected'

sqlQuery.name: TroemelCeInfectionRnaSeqPctProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_set_id as internal, name as term, name as display from apidb.profileset ps where ps.name in ('percentile - C. elegans Time Series - Infected', 'percentile - Nematocida parisii ERTm1 Spores')

sqlQuery.name: kappeAnalysis
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id and ps.name = 'kappe_all_comparisons_profiles' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: LauBBovisMicroarray

sqlQuery.name: LauBBovisMicroarrayPct
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset where name = 'percentile - Lau B.b. Virulent vs Attenuated'

sqlQuery.name: cowmanInvasionKO

sqlQuery.name: cowmanInvasionKOPct
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'Cowman Invasion KO-averaged' as display from apidb.profileset where name = 'percentile - Profiles of Cowman Invasion KO-averaged'

sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'Su CQ Treatment' as display from apidb.profileset where name in ('E-GEOD-10022 array from Su') order by term desc

sqlQuery.name: cowmanSir2PercentileSample

sqlQuery.name: RNASeqPfalSamples
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, CASE WHEN pen.name ='3D7' THEN 'Reference: ' || pen.name WHEN pen.name ='PL01' THEN 'parasites from pregnant women: ' || pen.name WHEN pen.name ='PL02' THEN 'parasites from children: ' || pen.name ELSE pen.name END as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps WHERE pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id AND ps.name = 'P.falciparum duffy mRNA Seq data' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: StunnenbergRNASeqRBCPfalFc
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.name as term, ps.profile_set_id as internal, Case When name ='pfal3D7_Stunnenberg_pi_time_series' Then 'Post-Infection (RBC) RNA-Seq time Series' When name = 'pfal3D7_Stunnenberg_pi_time_series_scaled' Then 'Post-Infection (RBC) RNA-Seq time Series (Scaled)' End as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name in ( 'pfal3D7_Stunnenberg_pi_time_series', 'pfal3D7_Stunnenberg_pi_time_series_scaled' )

sqlQuery.name: watersInfectionCycle
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.name as term, ps.profile_set_id as internal, ps.name as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name like 'Waters HP%'

sqlQuery.name: watersInfectionCyclePercent
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.name as term, ps.profile_set_id as internal, REPLACE (ps.name, 'red percentile - ', '') as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name like 'red percentile - Waters HP%'

sqlQuery.name: cortesTranscript3D7
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.name as term, ps.profile_set_id as internal, substr(ps.name,(instr(ps.name,':',1)+2)) as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name like 'Cortes Transcript Variantome - 3D7% :%'

sqlQuery.name: cortesTranscript7G8
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.name as term, ps.profile_set_id as internal, substr(ps.name,(instr(ps.name,':',1)+2)) as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name like 'Cortes Transcript Variantome%7G8% :%'

sqlQuery.name: cortesTranscriptHB3
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.name as term, ps.profile_set_id as internal, substr(ps.name,(instr(ps.name,':',1)+2))as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name like 'Cortes Transcript Variantome%HB3% :%'

sqlQuery.name: cortesTranscriptD10
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.name as term, ps.profile_set_id as internal, substr(ps.name,(instr(ps.name,':',1)+2)) as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name like 'Cortes Transcript Variantome%D10% :%'

sqlQuery.name: cortesTranscriptPct3D7
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.name as term, ps.profile_set_id as internal, substr(ps.name,(instr(ps.name,':',1)+2)) as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name like 'percentile - Cortes Transcript Variantome - 3D7% :%'

sqlQuery.name: cortesTranscriptPct7G8
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.name as term, ps.profile_set_id as internal, substr(ps.name,(instr(ps.name,':',1)+2)) as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name like 'percentile - Cortes Transcript Variantome%7G8% :%'

sqlQuery.name: cortesTranscriptPctHB3
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.name as term, ps.profile_set_id as internal, substr(ps.name,(instr(ps.name,':',1)+2)) as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name like 'percentile - Cortes Transcript Variantome%HB3% :%'

sqlQuery.name: cortesTranscriptPctD10
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.name as term, ps.profile_set_id as internal, substr(ps.name,(instr(ps.name,':',1)+2)) as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name like 'percentile - Cortes Transcript Variantome%D10% :%'

sqlQuery.name: cortesCGH
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.name as term, ps.profile_set_id as internal, ps.name as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name = 'Cortes CGH Profiles'

sqlQuery.name: cortesCGHDirectComparison
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.name as term, ps.profile_set_id as internal, Replace(ps.name,'_',',') || ' vs. 3D7-A' as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name = 'Cortes CGH Profiles'

sqlQuery.name: cortesCGHSamples
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.name || ' vs. Reference (3D7-A)' as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen WHERE pen.profile_set_id = $$profileset_generic$$ order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: cortesAllStrainsSamples
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct Replace(pen.name,'_',',') as display, pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, CASE WHEN pen.name in ('3D7-A','3D7A','10G','1_2B','W41') THEN '3D7-A derived' WHEN pen.name in ('3D7-B','3D7B') THEN '3D7-B derived' WHEN pen.name in ('7G8','KG7','LD10','WE5','ZF8') THEN '7G8 derived' WHEN pen.name in ('D10','E3','F1','G2','G4') THEN 'D10 derived' WHEN pen.name in ('AB10','AB6','HB3A') THEN 'HB3A derived' WHEN pen.name in ('BB8','BC4','HB3B') THEN 'HB3B derived' END as parentTerm from apidb.profileset ps, apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profile tpp, apidb.profileset tpps where pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id and ps.profile_set_id = $$profileset_generic$$ and tpps.profile_set_id = tpp.profile_set_id and tpps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id UNION select scgroup.name as display, scgroup.name as term, -1 as internal, '3D7 derived' as parentTerm from ( select '3D7-A derived' as name from dual union select '3D7-B derived' as name from dual )scgroup, apidb.profileset ps, apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profile tpp, apidb.profileset tpps where pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id and ps.profile_set_id = $$profileset_generic$$ and tpps.profile_set_id = tpp.profile_set_id and tpps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id and pen.name in ('3D7-A','3D7A','10G','1_2B','W41','3D7-B','3D7B') UNION select scgroup.name as display, scgroup.name as term, -1 as internal, 'HB3 derived' as parentTerm from (select 'HB3A derived' as name from dual union select 'HB3B derived' as name from dual )scgroup, apidb.profileset ps, apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profile tpp, apidb.profileset tpps where pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id and ps.profile_set_id = $$profileset_generic$$ and tpps.profile_set_id = tpp.profile_set_id and tpps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id and pen.name in ('AB10','AB6','HB3A','BB8','BC4','HB3B') UNION select parent.name as display, parent.name as term, -1 as internal, '' as parentTerm from ( Select CASE WHEN pen.name in ('3D7-A','3D7A','10G','1_2B','W41','3D7-B','3D7B') THEN '3D7 derived' WHEN pen.name in ('AB10','AB6','HB3A','BB8','BC4','HB3B') THEN 'HB3 derived' WHEN pen.name in ('7G8','KG7','LD10','WE5','ZF8') THEN '7G8 derived' WHEN pen.name in ('D10','E3','F1','G2','G4') THEN 'D10 derived' END as name from apidb.profileset ps, apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profile tpp, apidb.profileset tpps where pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id and ps.profile_set_id = $$profileset_generic$$ and tpps.profile_set_id = tpp.profile_set_id and tpps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id) parent

sqlQuery.name: RNASeqPfalFcOnePd
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, 'Parasites from children' as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps WHERE pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id AND ps.name = 'P.falciparum duffy mRNA Seq data' AND pen.name = 'PL02'

sqlQuery.name: RNASeqPfalFcTwoPd
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, 'Parasites from pregnant women' as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps WHERE pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id AND ps.name = 'P.falciparum duffy mRNA Seq data' AND pen.name = 'PL01'

sqlQuery.name: ExprnPercentilePfSampleRnaSeqTP
sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_set_id as internal, name as term, name as display from apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'percentile - pfal3D7_Stunnenberg_pi_time_series'

sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_set_id as internal, name as term, name as display from apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'percentile - P. falciparum Newbold mRNA Seq data'

sqlQuery.name: SuSevenStagesPercentileSampleRnaSeq
sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_set_id as internal, name as term, name as display from apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'percentile - P. falciparum Su Seven Stages RNA Seq data'

sqlQuery.name: SuStrandSpecificPercentileSampleRnaSeq
sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_set_id as internal, name as term, name as display from apidb.profileset ps where ps.name in ('percentile - P. falciparum Su Strand Specific RNA Seq data - sense strand', 'percentile - P. falciparum Su Strand Specific RNA Seq data - antisense strand') order by name desc

sqlQuery.name: DuffyPercentileSampleRnaSeq
sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_set_id as internal, name as term, name as display from apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'percentile - P.falciparum duffy mRNA Seq data'

sqlQuery.name: ExpressionPercentilPfSampleRnaSeq
sqlQuery.sql: Select pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.name as term, CASE WHEN pen.name ='PL01' THEN 'Parasites from pregnant women' WHEN pen.name ='PL02' THEN 'Parasites from children' ELSE pen.name END as display from apidb.profileelementname pen,apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id and ps.name = 'percentile - P.falciparum duffy mRNA Seq data' and not pen.name ='3D7' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: HalfLifeStage
sqlQuery.sql:
select pen1.profile_element_name_id || ',' || pen2.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen1.name as term, decode(pen1.name,'R','Ring','T','Trophozoite', 'S', 'Schizont', 'LS', 'Late Schizont') as display from apidb.profileelementname pen1,apidb.profileset ps1, apidb.profileelementname pen2,apidb.profileset ps2
where ps1.profile_set_id = pen1.profile_set_id and ps1.name = 'Profiles of Derisi HalfLife-half_life' and ps2.profile_set_id = pen2.profile_set_id and ps2.name = 'Profiles of Derisi HalfLife-std_dev' and pen1.name = pen2.name order by pen1.element_order

sqlQuery.name: ArchetypalLines_Types
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset where name = 'Expression profiling of the 3 archetypal T. gondii lineages'

sqlQuery.name: GregoryRNASeqTachyTs
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset where name in ('T. gondii VEG time series mRNA Illumina sequences aligned to the ME49 Genome. - sense strand', 'T. gondii VEG time series mRNA Illumina sequences aligned to the ME49 Genome. - antisense strand', 'T. gondii ME49 time series mRNA Illumina sequences aligned to the ME49 Genome. - sense strand', 'T. gondii ME49 time series mRNA Illumina sequences aligned to the ME49 Genome. - antisense strand') order by name desc

sqlQuery.name: GregoryRNASeqTachyTsPct
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset where name in ('percentile - T. gondii VEG time series mRNA Illumina sequences aligned to the ME49 Genome. - sense strand', 'percentile - T. gondii VEG time series mRNA Illumina sequences aligned to the ME49 Genome. - antisense strand', 'percentile - T. gondii ME49 time series mRNA Illumina sequences aligned to the ME49 Genome. - sense strand', 'percentile - T. gondii ME49 time series mRNA Illumina sequences aligned to the ME49 Genome. - antisense strand') order by name desc

sqlQuery.name: BoothroydRNASeqOocystTs
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset where name in ('T. gondii M4 oocyte time series mRNA Illumina sequences aligned to the ME49 Genome. - sense strand', 'T. gondii M4 oocyte time series mRNA Illumina sequences aligned to the ME49 Genome. - antisense strand') order by name desc

sqlQuery.name: BoothroydRNASeqOocystPct
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset where name in ('percentile - T. gondii M4 oocyte time series mRNA Illumina sequences aligned to the ME49 Genome. - sense strand', 'percentile - T. gondii M4 oocyte time series mRNA Illumina sequences aligned to the ME49 Genome. - antisense strand') order by name desc

sqlQuery.name: SibleyRNASeqBradyPct
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset where name in ('percentile - T. gondii ME49 bradyzoite mRNA Illumina sequences aligned to the ME49 Genome. - antisense strand', 'percentile - T. gondii ME49 bradyzoite mRNA Illumina sequences aligned to the ME49 Genome. - sense strand') order by name desc

sqlQuery.name: ArchetypalLines_Strains
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset where name = 'Expression profiling of T. gondii strains'

sqlQuery.name: ArchetypalLines_Types_Pct
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset where name = 'percentile - Expression profiling of the 3 archetypal T. gondii lineages'

sqlQuery.name: ArchetypalLines_Strains_Pct
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset where name = 'percentile - Expression profiling of T. gondii strains'

sqlQuery.name: RNASeqReidPct
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.profile_set_id as internal, name as term, name as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name = 'percentile - T. gondii VEG Day 3-4 Tachyzoite aligned to the TgME49 Genome'

sqlQuery.name: RNASeqReidNcPct
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ps.profile_set_id as internal, name as term, name as display FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name = 'percentile - N. caninum Day 3-4 Tachyzoite'

sqlQuery.name: RNASeqSampleOrganismPct
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(set(CAST(COLLECT(id order by id) AS apidb.varchartab)), ',') as internal, term as term, term as display FROM ( SELECT distinct to_char(ps.profile_set_id) as id, 'Trypanosoma brucei' as term FROM apidb.profileset ps WHERE ps.name in ('T.brucei George Cross RNA Sequence min-Profiles Percentile') ) GROUP BY term

sqlQuery.name: RNASeqBruceiLifeStage
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, CASE WHEN pen.name ='BF_All.min' THEN 'Blood form' WHEN pen.name = 'PF_WT.min' THEN 'Procyclic form - wild type' ELSE pen.name END as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps WHERE pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id AND ps.name = 'T.brucei George Cross RNA Sequence min-Profiles' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: LifeCycStgCruziPage
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(set(CAST(COLLECT(id order by id) AS apidb.varchartab)), ',') as internal, term as term, term as display FROM (SELECT distinct to_char(pen.profile_element_name_id) as id, pen.name as term FROM ApiDB.ProfileElementName pen, ApiDB.ProfileSet ps WHERE ps.name = 'Profiles of T.cruzi Tarleton Rick array data' AND ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id) GROUP BY term

sqlQuery.name: LinfantumPage
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT a.name as term, CASE WHEN (a.name = 'Papadopoulou Linfantum axenic amastigote page analysis') THEN 'Axenic amastigotes vs promastigotes' WHEN (a.name = 'Papadopoulou Linfantum intracellular amastigote page analysis') THEN 'Intracellular amastigotes vs promastigotes' WHEN (a.name = 'Papadopoulou Linfantum axenic vs intracellular amastigote page analysis') THEN 'Axenic vs Intracellular amastigotes' END as display, a.analysis_id as internal FROM Rad.Analysis a, Rad.Protocol p WHERE a.protocol_id = p.protocol_id AND p.name = 'Papadopoulou amastigote PaGE'

sqlQuery.name: Tb_Page_DHH1_Expts
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT a.name as term, CASE WHEN (a.name = 'T. brucei DHH1 wild type page analysis') THEN 'DHH1 induced vs. uninduced procyclics - wild type' WHEN (a.name = 'T. brucei DHH1 DEAD-DQAD mutant page analysis') THEN 'DHH1 induced vs. uninduced procyclics - DEAD:DQAD mutant' END as display, a.analysis_id as internal FROM Rad.Analysis a WHERE a.name in ('T. brucei DHH1 wild type page analysis','T. brucei DHH1 DEAD-DQAD mutant page analysis')

sqlQuery.name: Tb_Page_Pct_HeatShock
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct display as term, display as display, internal as internal from ( select pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, CASE WHEN (ps.name like '%red%') THEN 'Heat shock treated procyclics' WHEN (ps.name like '%green%')THEN 'Untreated procyclics' END as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id and ps.name in ('T. brucei under heat shock array data profile percents (green)','T. brucei under heat shock array data profile percents (red)')) order by display asc

sqlQuery.name: Tb_Page_Pct_DHH1
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct display as term,display as display, internal as internal from ( select pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, CASE WHEN (ps.name like '%wild type%' and ps.name like '%red%') THEN 'DHH1 induced procyclics - wild type' WHEN (ps.name like '%wild type%' and ps.name like '%green%') THEN 'DHH1 uninduced procyclics - wild type' WHEN (ps.name like '%mutant%' and ps.name like '%green%') THEN 'DHH1 uninduced procyclics - DEAD:DQAD mutant' WHEN (ps.name like '%mutant%' and ps.name like '%red%') THEN 'DHH1 induced procyclics - DEAD:DQAD mutant' END as display from apidb.profileset ps, apidb.profileelementname pen where pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id and ps.name in ('T. brucei DHH1 wild type array data profile percents (red)','T. brucei DHH1 DEAD-DQAD mutant array data profile percents (green)','T. brucei DHH1 wild type array data profile percents (green)','T. brucei DHH1 DEAD-DQAD mutant array data profile percents (red)'))

sqlQuery.name: Li_Page_Pct_Comparisons
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(set(CAST(COLLECT(id order by id) AS apidb.varchartab)), ',') as internal, term as term, term as display FROM (SELECT distinct to_char(pen.profile_element_name_id) as id, CASE WHEN ps.name like '%red%' and pen.name like '%intracellular%' THEN 'Intracellular Amastigotes' WHEN ps.name like '%red%' and pen.name like '%axenic%' THEN 'Axenic Amastigotes' ELSE 'Promastigotes' END as term FROM ApiDB.ProfileElementName pen, ApiDB.Profile p, ApiDB.ProfileSet ps WHERE ps.name in ('Linfantum axenic and intracellular amastigote array data profile percents(green)','Linfantum axenic and intracellular amastigote array data profile percents(red)') AND p.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id AND ps.profile_set_id = p.profile_set_id) GROUP BY term

sqlQuery.name: Lm_Page_Pct_Comparisons
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(set(CAST(COLLECT(id order by id) AS apidb.varchartab)), ',') as internal, term as term, term as display FROM (SELECT distinct to_char(pen.profile_element_name_id) as id, CASE WHEN ps.name like '%red%' and pen.name like '%Amastigote%' THEN 'Lesion Derived Amastigotes (3 replicates)' WHEN ps.name like '%red%' and pen.name like '%Metacyclic Promastigote%' THEN 'PNA - Metacyclic Promastigote (3 replicates)' ELSE 'Early Log Procyclic Promastigote (3 replicates)' END as term FROM ApiDB.ProfileElementName pen, ApiDB.Profile p, ApiDB.ProfileSet ps WHERE ps.name in ('Percents of L.major Beverly Steve array data(green)','Percents of L.major Beverly Steve array data(red)') AND p.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id AND ps.profile_set_id = p.profile_set_id) GROUP BY term

sqlQuery.name: CryptoRtPcrTimesPoints
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.name as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen where pen.profile_set_id = $$profileset_generic$$ ORDER BY pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: mRNADgrdTbruceiRnaSeqSmpl
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, replace(pen.name,'_',' ') as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen where pen.profile_set_id = $$profileset_generic$$ ORDER BY pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: mRNADgrdTbruceiRnaSeqSamples
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.name as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen where pen.profile_set_id = $$profileset_generic_coverage$$ ORDER BY pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: TschudiTbruceiRnaSeq
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.name as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen where pen.profile_set_id = $$profileset_generic$$ ORDER BY pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: CellCycleTbruceiRnaSeq
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, CASE WHEN pen.name like '%0.5%' THEN '0.5 Hours' WHEN pen.name like '%3%' THEN '3 Hours' WHEN pen.name like '%5.5%' THEN '5.5 Hours' ELSE '7.25 Hours' END as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen where pen.profile_set_id = $$profileset_generic$$ ORDER BY pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: LifeCycStgTbruceiRnaSeqRef
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, 'Uninduced sample' as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen where pen.profile_set_id = $$profileset_generic_coverage$$ and pen.name in ('No_Tet')

sqlQuery.name: LifeCycStgTbruceiRnaSeq
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, CASE WHEN (pen.name = 'PF') THEN 'Induced procyclics' WHEN (pen.name = 'BFD3') THEN 'Induced bloodstream form (day 3)' WHEN (pen.name = 'BFD6') THEN 'Induced bloodstream form (day 6)' WHEN (pen.name = 'DIF') THEN 'DIF (induced throughout growth) form' || to_char(chr(185)) END as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen where pen.profile_set_id = $$profileset_generic_coverage$$ and pen.name in ('BFD3','BFD6','DIF','PF') order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: LifeCycStgLmajorPage
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT a.name as term, a.analysis_id as internal, a.name as display FROM rad.analysis a where (name = 'PNA - Metacyclic Promastigote vs. Early Log Procyclic Promastigote' or name = 'Lesion Derived Amastigote vs. Early Log Procyclic Promastigote')

sqlQuery.name: LifeCycStgTbrucei_DRBD3
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT a.name as term, analysis_id as internal, replace (a.name,'TbDRBD3 RNAi','TbDRBD3-depleted Induced vs Uninduced') as display FROM rad.analysis a WHERE a.name like '%TbDRBD3%'

sqlQuery.name: LifeCycStgBruceiPage
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, CASE WHEN pen.name = 'pf_stat' THEN 'PCF Stat' WHEN pen.name = 'pf_log' THEN 'PCF Log' WHEN pen.name = 'sl' THEN 'Slender' WHEN pen.name = 'st' THEN 'Stumpy' WHEN pen.name = 'bf' THEN 'Blood Form' ELSE pen.name END as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps WHERE pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id AND ps.name = 'Expression profiling of Tbrucei five life cycle stages' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: ScTimeSeriesProfiles

sqlQuery.name: Toc1MicroarrayProfiles

sqlQuery.name: Toc1MicroarrayPercentiles

sqlQuery.name: PhyraConditionRnaSeqProfiles
