sqlQuery.name: BruceiExperimentMaxPercentile
sqlQuery.sql: select max(pe.value) as term, max(pe.value) as internal from apidb.profile p, apidb.profileelement pe, apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = $$expressionPercentileExptsBrucei$$ and p.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id and ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id and p.profile_id = pe.profile_id and pe.element_order = pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: ExpressionPercentilSampleRnaSeq
sqlQuery.sql: Select pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.name as term, case when pen.name = 'PF_WT.min' then 'Procyclic Form' when pen.name = 'BF_All.min' then 'Blood Form' else pen.name end as display from apidb.profileelementname pen,apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id and ps.name = 'T.brucei George Cross RNA Sequence min-Profiles Percentile' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: ExperessionPecentileSamplesBoothroyd
sqlQuery.sql: Select pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.name as term, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen,apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id and ps.name = 'percentile - Expression profiles of Tgondii ME49 Boothroyd experiments' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: Brucei5stgExperessionPecentileSamples
sqlQuery.sql: Select pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.name as term, case when pen.name = 'sl' then 'Slender' when pen.name = 'st' then 'Stumpy' when pen.name = 'pf_log' then 'PCF Log' when pen.name = 'pf_stat' then 'PCF Stat' when pen.name = 'bf' then 'Blood Form' else pen.name end as display from apidb.profileelementname pen,apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id and ps.name = 'Percents of Tbrucei five life cycle stages' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: InfantumExperessionPecentileSamples
sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_element_name_id as internal, name as term, case when name = 'sl' then 'Slender' when name = 'bf-hd' then 'Blood form - high density' when name = 'bf-ld' then 'Blood form - low density' else name end as display from apidb.profileelementname where profile_set_id = $$expressionPercentileExptsInfantum$$ order by element_order

sqlQuery.name: InfantumExperessionPecentileExpts
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, CASE WHEN name = 'Percents of the Linfantum promastigote time-course biorep01' THEN 'Replicate 1' WHEN name = 'Percents of the Linfantum promastigote time-course biorep02' THEN 'Replicate 2' ELSE name END as Display from apidb.profileset where name in ('Percents of the Linfantum promastigote time-course biorep02','Percents of the Linfantum promastigote time-course biorep01')

sqlQuery.name: CruziExperessionPecentileSamples
sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_element_name_id as internal, name as term, case when name = 'sl' then 'Slender' when name = 'bf-hd' then 'Blood form - high density' when name = 'bf-ld' then 'Blood form - low density' else name end as display from apidb.profileelementname where profile_set_id = $$expressionPercentileExptsCruzi$$ order by element_order

sqlQuery.name: CruziExperessionPecentileExpts
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, CASE WHEN name = 'Percents of T.cruzi Tarleton Rick array data(green)' THEN '(2) T.cruzi expression percentile data channel 1 (green)' WHEN name = 'Percents of T.cruzi Tarleton Rick array data(red)' THEN '(1) T.cruzi expression percentile data channel 2 (red)' ELSE name END as Display from apidb.profileset where name in ('Percents of T.cruzi Tarleton Rick array data(red)','Percents of T.cruzi Tarleton Rick array data(green)')

sqlQuery.name: BruceiExperessionPecentileSamples
sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_element_name_id as internal, name as term, case when name = 'sl' then 'Slender' when name = 'bf-hd' then 'Blood form - high density' when name = 'bf-ld' then 'Blood form - low density' else name end as display from apidb.profileelementname where profile_set_id = $$expressionPercentileExptsBrucei$$ order by element_order

sqlQuery.name: BruceiExperessionPecentileExpts
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, CASE WHEN name = 'Percentiles of T. brucei differentiation series' THEN 'Percentiles of T. brucei differentiation data' ELSE name END as Display from apidb.profileset where name in ('Percentiles of T. brucei differentiation series')

sqlQuery.name: MetabolicPathways
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT dr.primary_identifier AS internal, TRIM(REPLACE(decode(dr.lowercase_secondary_identifier, null, dr.primary_identifier, dr.lowercase_secondary_identifier), CHR(191),'')) AS display, dr.primary_identifier AS term FROM sres.DbRef dr, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed WHERE dr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND ed.name in ('pfal3D7_dbxref_simple_gene2HagaiPathway_RSRC','tgonME49_dbxref_protein2Pathways_Feng_RSRC') AND dr.primary_identifier != 'qualityControl' ORDER BY display

sqlQuery.name: phenotype
sqlQuery.sql: select display,term,internal,parentTerm from ( select go_term || ' (' || count(distinct gene) || ')' as display, go_term as term, go_term as internal,'' as parentTerm,count(distinct gene) as order_num from apidb.SIRNA, ApidbTuning.GeneAttributes ga where gene = ga.source_id group by go_term union select pato_term || ' (' || count(distinct gene) || ')' as display,go_term || pato_term as term, go_term || pato_term as internal,go_term as parentTerm, count(distinct gene) as order_num from apidb.SIRNA, ApidbTuning.GeneAttributes ga where gene = ga.source_id group by pato_term, go_term) order by order_num desc

sqlQuery.name: MinMaxAvgComp
sqlQuery.sql: select term || p.so as term, internal,display, p.so from ( select 'average' as term, 'average' as internal, 'average' as display, CASE WHEN '$$regulated_dir$$' = 'abs' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END as so from dual union select 'minimum' as term, 'minimum' as internal, 'minimum' as display, CASE WHEN '$$regulated_dir$$' = '-' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END as so from dual union select 'maximum' as term, 'maximum' as internal, 'maximum' as display, CASE WHEN '$$regulated_dir$$' = '+' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END as so from dual ) p, ( select 'abs' as type from dual union select '+' as type from dual union select '-' as type from dual ) t, ( select 1 as so from dual union select 2 as so from dual union select 3 as so from dual ) o where p.so = o.so and type = '$$regulated_dir$$' order by p.so

sqlQuery.name: MinMaxAvgRef
sqlQuery.sql: select term || p.so as term, internal,display, p.so from ( select 'average' as term, 'average' as internal, 'average' as display, CASE WHEN '$$regulated_dir$$' = 'abs' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END as so from dual union select 'minimum' as term, 'minimum' as internal, 'minimum' as display, CASE WHEN '$$regulated_dir$$' = '+' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END as so from dual union select 'maximum' as term, 'maximum' as internal, 'maximum' as display, CASE WHEN '$$regulated_dir$$' = '-' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END as so from dual ) p, ( select 'abs' as type from dual union select '+' as type from dual union select '-' as type from dual ) t, ( select 1 as so from dual union select 2 as so from dual union select 3 as so from dual ) o where p.so = o.so and type = '$$regulated_dir$$' order by p.so

sqlQuery.name: GenericSamples
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_element_name_id as internal, CASE WHEN name = '3D7' THEN 'Reference: ' || name WHEN name ='PL01' THEN 'parasites from pregnant women: ' || name WHEN name ='PL02' THEN 'parasites from children: ' || name WHEN name ='1_2B' THEN '1,2B' ELSE name END as display from apidb.profileelementname where profile_set_id = '$$profileset_generic$$' order by element_order

sqlQuery.name: Carruthers_TGondii_Page_Comp

sqlQuery.name: Matrajt_TGondii_Pct_Profiles

sqlQuery.name: Matrajt_TGondii_Page
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'Toxoplasma gondii Differentiation Mutant Transcript Expression' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'TgRH_Matrajt_GSE23174_Bz_WildType_V_Mutant' union select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'Toxoplasma gondii Differentiation Mutant Expression, 11 Hours Post-Egress' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'TgRH_Matrajt_GSE23174_Bz_11hr_Egress' order by term desc

sqlQuery.name: Matrajt_TGondii_Page_Comp
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_element_name_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileelementname where profile_set_id = '$$profileset_generic$$' order by element_order

sqlQuery.name: Gilchrist_Ehist_G3_V_HM1-IMSS_Profiles
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'Entamoeba histolytica G3 v. HM1:IMSS Transcript Expression' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'Ehist_Gilchrist_G3_V_HM1:IMSS'

sqlQuery.name: Gilchrist_Ehist_G3_V_HM1-IMSS_Pct_Profiles
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'Entamoeba histolytica G3 v. HM1:IMSS Transcript Expression' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'percentile - Ehist_Gilchrist_G3_V_HM1:IMSS'

sqlQuery.name: Gilchrist_Ehist_G3_V_HM1-IMSS_Page
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'Entamoeba histolytica G3 v. HM1:IMSS Transcript Expression' as display from apidb.profileset where name in ('Ehist_Gilchrist_G3_V_HM1:IMSS') order by term desc

sqlQuery.name: Gilchrist_Ehist_G3_V_HM1-IMSS_Page_Comp
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_element_name_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileelementname where profile_set_id = '$$profileset_generic$$' order by element_order

sqlQuery.name: Gilchrist_Ehist_ExpressionTiming_Profiles
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'Strains labeled with Affymetrix amplification protocol' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'E. histolytica Gene expression in cysts and trophozoites' Union Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'Strains labeled with Nugen SPIA amplification protocol' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'E. histolytica Impact of intestinal colonization and invasion on transcriptome'

sqlQuery.name: Gilchrist_Ehist_ExpressionTiming_Pct_Profiles
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'Strains labeled with Affymetrix amplification protocol' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'percentile - E. histolytica Gene expression in cysts and trophozoites' Union Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'Strains labeled with Nugen SPIA amplification protocol' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'percentile - E. histolytica Impact of intestinal colonization and invasion on transcriptome'

sqlQuery.name: HornRNAiSeqProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, case when name = 'T.brucei Horn RNAi Sequence minProfiles' then'Quantitated from gene model (5 prime UTR + CDS)' else 'Quantitated from the CDS Sequence' end as display from apidb.profileset where name in ('T.brucei Horn RNAi Sequence minProfiles', 'T.brucei Horn RNAi Sequence minProfiles using CDS coordinates') order by term desc

sqlQuery.name: ArcherRnaSeqProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'T.brucei Cell Cycle Stages RNASeq' as display from apidb.profileset where name in ('T.brucei Archer Stuart Cell Cycle RNA Sequence min-Profiles') order by term desc

sqlQuery.name: TschudiRnaSeqPercentile
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'T.brucei Tschudi RNASeq Percentile' as display from apidb.profileset where name = 'percentile - T.brucei Tschudi RNA Seq data' order by term desc

sqlQuery.name: LippunerRnaSeqProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'C.parvume Transcriptome of Calf Intestine Oocyst Infection RNASeq' as display from apidb.profileset where name = 'CparIowaII Lippuner calf intestine oocyst infection' order by term desc

sqlQuery.name: LippunerRnaSeqPercentile
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'C.parvum Lippuner Calf Intestine Oocyst Infection RNASeq Percentile' as display from apidb.profileset where name = 'percentile - CparIowaII Lippuner calf intestine oocyst infection' order by term desc

sqlQuery.name: Newbold_Llinas_RnaSeqProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'P. falciparum Newbold RNASeq' as display from apidb.profileset where name in ('P. falciparum Newbold mRNA Seq data') order by term desc

sqlQuery.name: Su_Seven_Stages_RnaSeqProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset where name in ('P. falciparum Su Seven Stages RNA Seq data') order by term desc

sqlQuery.name: Su_Strand_Specific_RnaSeqProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, name as display from apidb.profileset where name in ('P. falciparum Su Strand Specific RNA Seq data - sense strand', 'P. falciparum Su Strand Specific RNA Seq data - antisense strand') order by term desc

sqlQuery.name: Duffy_RnaSeqProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'P.falciparum duffy mRNA Seq data' as display from apidb.profileset where name in ('P.falciparum duffy mRNA Seq data') order by term desc

sqlQuery.name: WhiteCellCycleProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'Cell Cycle - Spline Smoothed' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'M.White Cell Cycle Microarray spline smoothed' and element_count = 13

sqlQuery.name: WhiteCellCyclePctProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: Select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'Cell Cycle - Percentile' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'percentile - M.White Cell Cycle Microarray'

sqlQuery.name: ClaytonDgrdPctProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'T.brucei mRNA Degradation Studies - RNASeq Percentiles' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'T.brucei Clayton RNA Sequence of transcriptome-wide mRNA degradation minProfiles Percentile'

sqlQuery.name: ArcherCellCycPctProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'T.brucei Cell Cycle Stages RNASeq Percentiles' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'T.brucei Archer Stuart Cell Cycle RNA Sequence min-Profiles Percentile'

sqlQuery.name: NilssonTbruceiSpliceSitesPctProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'T.brucei RNASeq Spliced Leader Sites' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'T.brucei RNASeq Spliced Leader And Poly A Sites from Nilsson percentile'

sqlQuery.name: NilssonTcruziSpliceSitesPctProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'T.cruzi RNASeq Spliced Leader Sites' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'Tcruzi RNASeq Spliced Leader And Poly A Sites from Nilsson percentile'

sqlQuery.name: KissingerRTPCRProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'C.parvum expression profiles based on RT-PCR' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'Cparvum_RT_PCR_Kissinger'

sqlQuery.name: ClaytonRNADegradationProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'T.brucei mRNA Degradation Studies - RNASeq' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'T.brucei Clayton RNA Sequence of transcriptome-wide mRNA degradation minProfiles'

sqlQuery.name: ArcherCellCycleProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'T.brucei Cell Cycle Stages RNASeq' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'T.brucei Archer Stuart Cell Cycle RNA Sequence min-Profiles'

sqlQuery.name: NilssonTbruceiSpliceSitesProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'T.brucei RNASeq Spliced Leader Sites' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'T.brucei RNASeq Spliced Leader And Poly A Sites from Nilsson uniqProfile'

sqlQuery.name: NilssonTcruziSpliceSitesProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'T.cruzi RNASeq Spliced Leader Sites' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'Tcruzi RNASeq Spliced Leader And Poly A Sites from Nilsson uniqProfile'

sqlQuery.name: MylerSpliceSitesPctProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'L.major RNASeq Spliced Leader Sites' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'Lmajor RNASeq Spliced Leader And Poly A Sites from Myler percentile'

sqlQuery.name: MylerSpliceSitesProfiles
sqlQuery.sql: select name as term, profile_set_id as internal, 'L.major RNASeq Spliced Leader Sites' as display from apidb.profileset where name like 'Lmajor RNASeq Spliced Leader And Poly A Sites from Myler uniqProfile'

sqlQuery.name: SpliceSiteExperiment
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ed.name as term, edr.external_database_release_id as internal, CASE WHEN (ed.name = 'Tbrucei_RNASeq_Spliced_Leader_And_Poly_A_Sites_Nilsson_RSRC') THEN 'T. brucei RNASeq Spliced Leader' ELSE 'T. cruzi RNASeq Spliced Leader' END as display FROM sres.externaldatabase ed, sres.externaldatabaserelease edr WHERE ed.name in ('Tbrucei_RNASeq_Spliced_Leader_And_Poly_A_Sites_Nilsson_RSRC', 'Tcruzi_RNASeq_Spliced_Leader_And_Poly_A_Sites_Nilsson_RSRC') AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id

sqlQuery.name: BruceiSpliceSets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ed.name as term, edr.external_database_release_id as internal, 'T. brucei RNASeq Spliced Leader' AS display FROM sres.externaldatabase ed, sres.externaldatabaserelease edr WHERE ed.name = 'Tbrucei_RNASeq_Spliced_Leader_And_Poly_A_Sites_Nilsson_RSRC' AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id

sqlQuery.name: CruziSpliceSets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ed.name as term, edr.external_database_release_id as internal, 'T. cruzi RNASeq Spliced Leader' AS display FROM sres.externaldatabase ed, sres.externaldatabaserelease edr WHERE ed.name = 'Tcruzi_RNASeq_Spliced_Leader_And_Poly_A_Sites_Nilsson_RSRC' AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id

sqlQuery.name: SpliceSiteSample
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct sample_name as term, sample_name as internal, sample_name AS display FROM apidb.SpliceSiteGenes WHERE external_database_release_id = $$splice_site_generic$$ AND sample_name not like '%Alba%' ORDER BY sample_name
